column6: "If the first byte of the field is :math:`1`
column7: then it is followed by address. S in this case equals :math:`26`. If the first byte of the field is :math:`2`
column8: then it is followed by alias. In this case :math:`8 <= S <= 34`."

column2: "Amount of :ref:`DecentralCoins <02_decentralchain:DecentralCoin>` that will be leased to the account"
